name: Narodne centrum zdravotnickych informacii
legal: organisation financed from the contribution from state budget
memberOrga: NCZI has no members, only branch office in Slovak republic.
goal:
NCZI is responsible for:
- eHealth activitie on the national level in Slovak republic,
- cross - border eHealth activities,
- health indicators and health statistics reporting to slovak Ministry of health,
- medicine library activities in Slovak republic
euInitiatives: - activities discussed and coordinated in eHealth Network - cross border transfer of patient data, semantic interoperability, legislation with regards of cross border transfer of patient data.
